    • Method Detail

      • register

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Object> register(java.lang.String id,
                                                                     java.lang.String pw)
        Method to make new account. Gets the id and password and make new account if id had not been used. It generates token and save into database. It would return JSON with response data.

        If register succeeded, key is true and value is String which contains the token. If register is not successful, key is false, value is Integer which contains the failure code.

        Failure codes

        • 0: Server error. An error occurred when processing login.
        • 1: Username is already used.
        Parameters:
        id - id to register
        pw - password to register
        Returns:
        Pair with if register succeeded and code or token

      • login

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Object> login(java.lang.String id,
                                                                  java.lang.String pw)
        Method to login to server. Gets the id and password and verify by database. When login succeeded, it generates token and save into database. It would return JSON with response data.

        If login succeeded, key is true and value is String which contains the token. If login is not successful, key is false, value is Integer which contains the failure code.

        Failure codes

        • 0: Server error. An error occurred when processing login.
        • 1: id is not found.
        • 2: Password is incorrect.
        Parameters:
        id - id to login
        pw - password to login
        Returns:
        Pair with if register succeeded and code or token

      • loginWithToken

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Object> loginWithToken(java.lang.String id,
                                                                           java.lang.String token)
        Does similar thing with login function. login(String, String) It login with token instead of password. It has same response data format. It would regenerate the token and send back the new token.

        Failure codes

        • 0: Server error. An error occurred when processing login.
        • 1: id is not found.
        • 2: Token is not correct.
        Parameters:
        id - id to login
        token - token to login
        Returns:
        Pair with if register succeeded and code or token

      • logout

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer> logout(java.lang.String id,
                                                                    java.lang.String tk)
        It removes the token to verify from database. it would send response data.

        Failure codes

        • 0: Server error. An error occurred when processing login.
        • 1: id is not found.
        • 2: Already logged out.
        Parameters:
        id - id to logout
        tk - token to verify
        Returns:
        Pair with if register succeeded and code or token

      • deleteAccount

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Integer> deleteAccount(java.lang.String id,
                                                                           java.lang.String pw)
        It removes the account from the database. It would send response data.

        Failure codes

        • 0: Server error. An error occurred when processing login.
        • 1: id is not found.
        • 2: password is not correct.
        Parameters:
        id - id to delete account
        pw - password to the account
        Returns:
        Pair with if register succeeded and code or token

      • setImage

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Object> setImage(java.lang.String id,
                                                                     java.lang.String tk,
                                                                     java.lang.String img)
        Is sets the profile image to database It would send the response data

        Failure codes

        • 0: Server error. An error occurred when processing login.
        • 1: id is not found.
        • 2: token is not correct.
        Parameters:
        id - id to change the image
        tk - token to verify
        img - image data on base64 to save
        Returns:
        response data

      • getImage

        public javafx.util.Pair<java.lang.Boolean,java.lang.Object> getImage(java.lang.String id)
        returns the image of id

        Failure codes

        • 0: Server error. An error occurred when processing login.
        • 1: id is not found.
        • 2: id exists but image was not found.
        Parameters:
        id - id to get image
        Returns:
        response data
